overview: Putalow's Hatsune lives with his lesbian friend, Mika. She was dating Kokubun, but his wife appeared during the sex and became a shrine. Hatsune was shocked by how he was being tricked, but thanks to Mika, he recovered his energy. One day, Hatsune's sister Shizuka was informed that a lover called Itoyama was created. However, the true identity of Itoyama was a marriage fraudster who was aiming for Shizuka's deposit.
title: The Bride Is Wet on the Wedding Night
